titles.title: Tibetan Refugee Assistance Act of 2008
To provide for the admission to the United States of certain Tibetans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
7/17/2008--Introduced.
Tibetan Refugee Assistance Act of 2008 - Makes 3,000 immigrant visas in FY2010-FY2012 available to an individual who: (1) was born in Tibet or is the son, daughter, grandson, or granddaughter of a person born in Tibet; and (2) since before the date of the enactment of this Act, has been continuously residing in India or Nepal.
